wordageddon.service

Class QuestionGeneratorService

  • java.lang.Object
    • wordageddon.service.QuestionGeneratorService

  • public class QuestionGeneratorService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service for generating various types of questions about document text analysis. This class handles the logic for creating diverse question types: - Absolute frequency: how many times a word appears in a document - Relative frequency comparison: comparing frequencies of different words - Document-specific word association: which document contains a specific word - Exclusion questions: which word never appears in a document The service also tracks previously asked questions to avoid repetition.
    Since:
    2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gregorio Barberio, Francesco Peluso, Davide Quaranta, Ciro Ronca

        Parameters:
        dtm - the Document-Term Matrix containing processed document data
        documents - list of document names that should be used in the game

    • Method Detail

      • resetTracking

        public void resetTracking()
        Resets all tracking sets to allow reusing previously used questions. Call this when starting a new game session.

      • generateRandomQuestion

        public Question generateRandomQuestion(int questionNumber)
        Generates a question of a random type. Tries all question types in a random order until one succeeds.
        Parameters:
        questionNumber - The sequence number of the question in the current game
        Returns:
        the generated Question object, or a fallback question if generation fails

        Returns:
